# Special titlecasing for Dutch initial "ij".
::Any-Title();
# Fix up Ij at the beginning of a "word" (per Any-Title, notUAX #29)
[:^WB=ALetter:] [:WB=Extend:]* [[:WB=MidLetter:][:WB=MidNumLet:]]? { Ij } → IJ ;
